.b-sch-color-red.title: Must start/end on
.b-sch-color-red.content: Red events have a "must start on" or "must end on" constraint

.b-sch-color-orange.title: Start/finish no earlier than
.b-sch-color-orange.content: Orange events have a "start no earlier than" or "finish no earlier than" constraint

[data-event-id='5'].title: Try dragging
[data-event-id='5'].content: Dragging an event sets a "start no earlier than" constraint
